00076 + (void)initialize
00077 {
00078     if (self != [CPSearchField class])
00079         return;
00080 
00081     var bundle = [CPBundle bundleForClass:self];
00082     CPSearchFieldSearchImage = [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:@"CPSearchField/CPSearchFieldSearch.png"]];
00083     CPSearchFieldFindImage = [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:@"CPSearchField/CPSearchFieldFind.png"]];
00084     CPSearchFieldCancelImage = [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:@"CPSearchField/CPSearchFieldCancel.png"]];
00085     CPSearchFieldCancelPressedImage = [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:@"CPSearchField/CPSearchFieldCancelPressed.png"]];
00086 }

00088 - (id)initWithFrame:(CPRect)frame
00089 {
00090     self = [super initWithFrame:frame];
00091     if (self != nil)
00092     {
00093         _recentSearches = [CPArray array];
00094         _maximumRecents = 10;
00095         _sendsWholeSearchString = NO;
00096         _sendsSearchStringImmediately = NO;
00097         _recentsAutosaveName = nil;
00098          
00099         [self setBezeled:YES];
00100         [self setBezelStyle:CPTextFieldRoundedBezel];
00101         [self setBordered:YES];
00102         [self setEditable:YES];
00103         [self setDelegate:self];
00104         
00105         _cancelButton = [[CPButton alloc] initWithFrame:CPMakeRect(frame.size.width - 27,(frame.size.height-22)/2,22,22)];
00106         [self resetCancelButton];
00107         [_cancelButton setHidden:YES];
00108         [_cancelButton setAutoresizingMask:CPViewMinXMargin];
00109         [self addSubview:_cancelButton];
00110         
00111         _searchButton = [[CPButton alloc] initWithFrame:CPMakeRect(5,(frame.size.height-25)/2,25,25)];
00112         [self resetSearchButton];
00113         [self addSubview:_searchButton];
00114 
00115 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00116     _cancelButton._DOMElement.style.cursor = "default";
00117     _searchButton._DOMElement.style.cursor = "default";
00118 #endif
00119           
00120     }
00121     
00122     return self;
00123 }

00125 - (id)copy
00126 {
00127     var copy = [super copy];
00128     
00129     [copy setCancelButton:[_cancelButton copy]];
00130     [copy setSearchButton:[_searchButton copy]];
00131     [copy setSendsWholeSearchString:[_sendsWholeSearchString copy]];
00132     [copy setSendsSearchStringImmediately:[_sendsSearchStringImmediately copy]];
00133     [copy setMaximumRecents:_maximumRecents];
00134     if (_recentsAutosaveName)
00135         [copy setrecentsAutosaveName:[_recentsAutosaveName copy]];
00136     if (_searchMenuTemplate)
00137         [copy setSearchMenutemplate:[_searchMenuTemplate copy]];
00138     
00139     return copy;
00140 }

00165 - (void)resetSearchButton
00166 {
00167     var searchButtonImage, 
00168         action, 
00169         target,
00170         button = [self searchButton];
00171         
00172     if (_searchMenuTemplate === nil)
00173     {
00174         searchButtonImage = CPSearchFieldSearchImage;
00175         action = @selector(_sendAction:);
00176         target = self;
00177     }
00178     else
00179     {
00180         searchButtonImage = CPSearchFieldFindImage;
00181         action = @selector(_showMenu:);
00182         target = self;
00183     }
00184     
00185     [button setBordered:NO];
00186     [button setImageScaling:CPScaleToFit];
00187     [button setImage:searchButtonImage];
00188     [button setAutoresizingMask:CPViewMaxXMargin];
00189     [button setTarget:target];
00190     [button setAction:action];
00191 }

00215 - (void)resetCancelButton
00216 {
00217     var button = [self cancelButton];
00218     [button setBordered:NO];
00219     [button setImageScaling:CPScaleToFit];
00220     [button setImage:CPSearchFieldCancelImage];
00221     [button setAlternateImage:CPSearchFieldCancelPressedImage];
00222     [button setAutoresizingMask:CPViewMinXMargin];
00223     [button setTarget:self];
00224     [button setAction:@selector(_searchFieldCancel:)];
00225 }

00227 // Custom Layout
00234 - (CPRect)searchTextRectForBounds:(CPRect)rect
00235 {
00236     var leftOffset = 0, width = rect.size.width;
00237     
00238     if (_searchButton)
00239     {
00240         var searchRect = [_searchButton frame];
00241         leftOffset = searchRect.origin.x + searchRect.size.width;
00242     }
00243     
00244     if (_cancelButton)
00245     {
00246         var cancelRect = [_cancelButton frame];
00247         width = cancelRect.origin.x - leftOffset;
00248     }
00249     
00250     return CPMakeRect(leftOffset,rect.origin.y,width,rect.size.height);
00251 }

00348 - (void)setMaximumRecents:(int)max
00349 {
00350     if (max > 254)
00351         max = 254;
00352     else if (max < 0)
00353         max = 10;
00354     
00355     _maximumRecents = max;
00356 }

00362 - (CPArray)recentSearches
00363 {
00364     return _recentSearches;
00365 }
00366 
00372 - (void)setRecentSearches:(CPArray)searches
00373 {
00374     var max = MIN([self maximumRecents], [searches count]),
00375         searches = [searches subarrayWithRange:CPMakeRange(0, max)];
00376     
00377     _recentSearches = searches;    
00378     [self _autosaveRecentSearchList];
00379 }

00394 - (void)setRecentsAutosaveName:(CPString)name
00395 {
00396     if (_recentsAutosaveName != nil)
00397         [self _deregisterForAutosaveNotification];
00398         
00399     _recentsAutosaveName = name;
00400     
00401     if (_recentsAutosaveName != nil)
00402       [self _registerForAutosaveNotification];
00403 }

00409     var superbounds = [super contentRectForBounds:bounds];    
00410     return [self searchTextRectForBounds:superbounds];

00413 + (double)_keyboardDelayForPartialSearchString:(CPString)string
00414 {
00415     return (6 - MIN([string length],4))/10;
00416 }

00423 - (BOOL)isOpaque
00424 {
00425   return [super isOpaque] && [_cancelButton isOpaque] && [_searchButton isOpaque];
00426 }

00428 - (void)_updateCancelButtonVisibility
00429 {
00430     [_cancelButton setHidden:([[self stringValue] length] === 0)];
00431 }
00432 
00433 - (void)controlTextDidChange:(CPNotification)aNotification
00434 {
00435     if (![self sendsWholeSearchString])
00436     {
00437         if ([self sendsSearchStringImmediately])
00438             [self _sendPartialString];
00439         else
00440         {
00441             [_partialStringTimer invalidate];
00442             var timeInterval = [CPSearchField _keyboardDelayForPartialSearchString:[self stringValue]];
00443     
00444             _partialStringTimer = [CPTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:timeInterval 
00445                                                                    target:self 
00446                                                                  selector:@selector(_sendPartialString) 
00447                                                                  userInfo:nil 
00448                                                                   repeats:NO];         
00449         }
00450     }
00451     
00452     [self _updateCancelButtonVisibility];
00453 }
00454 
00455 - (void)_sendAction:(id)sender
00456 {
00457     [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];
00458 }
00459 
00460 - (void)sendAction:(SEL)anAction to:(id)anObject
00461 {
00462     [super sendAction:anAction to:anObject];
00463 
00464     [_partialStringTimer invalidate];
00465 
00466     [self _addStringToRecentSearches:[self stringValue]];
00467     [self _updateCancelButtonVisibility];
00468 }
00469 
00470 - (void)_addStringToRecentSearches:(CPString)string
00471 {
00472     if (string === nil || string === @"" || [_recentSearches containsObject:string])
00473         return;
00474         
00475     var searches = [CPMutableArray arrayWithArray:_recentSearches];
00476     [searches addObject:string];
00477     [self setRecentSearches:searches];
00478     [self _updateSearchMenu];
00479 }
00480 
00481 - (BOOL)trackMouse:(CPEvent)event
00482 {
00483     var rect,
00484         point,
00485         location = [event locationInWindow];
00486     
00487     point = [self convertPoint:location fromView:nil];
00488     
00489     rect = [self searchButtonRectForBounds:[self frame]];
00490     if (CPRectContainsPoint(rect,point))
00491     {
00492         return [[self searchButton] trackMouse:event];
00493     }
00494     
00495     rect = [self cancelButtonRectForBounds:[self frame]];
00496     if (CPRectContainsPoint(rect,point))
00497     {
00498         return [[self cancelButton] trackMouse:event];
00499     }
00500     
00501     return [super trackMouse:event];
00502 }
00503 
00504 - (CPMenu)_defaultSearchMenuTemplate
00505 {
00506     var template, item;
00507     
00508     template = [[CPMenu alloc] init];
00509     
00510     item = [[CPMenuItem alloc] initWithTitle:@"Recent searches" 
00511                                       action:NULL 
00512                                keyEquivalent:@""];
00513     [item setTag:CPSearchFieldRecentsTitleMenuItemTag];
00514     [item setEnabled:NO];
00515     [template addItem:item];
00516     
00517     item = [[CPMenuItem alloc] initWithTitle:@"Recent search item" 
00518                                       action:@selector(_searchFieldSearch:) 
00519                                keyEquivalent:@""];
00520     [item setTag:CPSearchFieldRecentsMenuItemTag];
00521     [item setTarget:self];
00522     [template addItem:item];
00523     
00524     item = [[CPMenuItem alloc] initWithTitle:@"Clear recent searches" 
00525                                       action:@selector(_searchFieldClearRecents:) 
00526                                keyEquivalent:@""];
00527     [item setTag:CPSearchFieldClearRecentsMenuItemTag];
00528     [item setTarget:self];
00529     [template addItem:item];
00530     
00531     item = [[CPMenuItem alloc] initWithTitle:@"No recent searches" 
00532                                       action:NULL 
00533                                keyEquivalent:@""];
00534     [item setTag:CPSearchFieldNoRecentsMenuItemTag];
00535     [item setEnabled:NO];
00536     [template addItem:item];
00537     
00538     return template;
00539 }
00540 
00541 - (void)_updateSearchMenu
00542 {
00543     if (_searchMenuTemplate === nil)
00544         return;
00545         
00546     var i, menu = [[CPMenu alloc] init],
00547         countOfRecents = [_recentSearches count],
00548         numberOfItems = [_searchMenuTemplate numberOfItems];
00549     
00550     for (i = 0; i < numberOfItems; i++)
00551     {
00552         var item = [_searchMenuTemplate itemAtIndex:i],
00553             tag = [item tag];
00554         
00555         if (!(tag === CPSearchFieldRecentsTitleMenuItemTag && countOfRecents === 0) &&
00556             !(tag === CPSearchFieldClearRecentsMenuItemTag && countOfRecents === 0) &&
00557             !(tag === CPSearchFieldNoRecentsMenuItemTag && countOfRecents != 0)    &&
00558             !(tag === CPSearchFieldRecentsMenuItemTag))
00559         {
00560             var itemAction, itemTarget;
00561             switch (tag)
00562             {
00563                 case CPSearchFieldRecentsTitleMenuItemTag : itemAction = NULL; itemTarget = NULL; break;
00564                 case CPSearchFieldClearRecentsMenuItemTag : itemAction = @selector(_searchFieldClearRecents:); itemTarget = self; break;
00565                 case CPSearchFieldNoRecentsMenuItemTag : itemAction = NULL; itemTarget = NULL; break;
00566                 default: itemAction = [item action]; itemTarget = [item target]; break;
00567             }
00568             
00569             if (tag === CPSearchFieldClearRecentsMenuItemTag || tag === CPSearchFieldRecentsTitleMenuItemTag)
00570             {
00571                 var separator = [CPMenuItem separatorItem];
00572                 [separator setEnabled:NO];
00573                 [menu addItem:separator];
00574             }
00575         
00576             var templateItem = [[CPMenuItem alloc] initWithTitle:[item title] 
00577                                                           action:itemAction 
00578                                                    keyEquivalent:[item keyEquivalent]];
00579             [templateItem setTarget:itemTarget];
00580             [templateItem setEnabled:([item isEnabled] && itemAction != NULL)];
00581             [templateItem setTag:tag];
00582             [menu addItem:templateItem];
00583         }
00584         else if (tag === CPSearchFieldRecentsMenuItemTag)
00585         {
00586             var j;
00587             for (j = 0; j < countOfRecents; j++)
00588             {
00589                 var rencentItem = [[CPMenuItem alloc] initWithTitle:[_recentSearches objectAtIndex:j] 
00590                                                              action:@selector(_searchFieldSearch:) 
00591                                                       keyEquivalent:[item keyEquivalent]];
00592                 [rencentItem setTarget:self];
00593                 [menu addItem:rencentItem];
00594             }
00595         }
00596     }    
00597     _searchMenu = menu;
00598 }
00599 
00600 - (void)_showMenu:(id)sender
00601 {
00602     if (_searchMenu === nil || [_searchMenu numberOfItems] === 0 || ![self isEnabled])
00603         return;
00604         
00605     var aFrame = [[self superview] convertRect:[self frame] toView:nil],
00606         location = CPMakePoint(aFrame.origin.x + 10, aFrame.origin.y + aFrame.size.height - 4);
00607     
00608     var anEvent = [CPEvent mouseEventWithType:CPRightMouseDown location:location modifierFlags:0 timestamp:[[CPApp currentEvent] timestamp] windowNumber:[[self window] windowNumber] context:nil eventNumber:1 clickCount:1 pressure:0];
00609     
00610     [CPMenu popUpContextMenu:_searchMenu withEvent:anEvent forView:sender];
00611 }
00612 
00613 - (void)_sendPartialString
00614 {
00615     [[self target] performSelector:[self action] withObject:self];
00616 }
00617 
00618 - (void)_searchFieldCancel:(id)sender
00619 {   
00620     [self setObjectValue:@""];
00621     [self _sendPartialString];
00622     [self _updateCancelButtonVisibility];
00623 }
00624 
00625 - (void)_searchFieldSearch:(id)sender
00626 {
00627     var searchString = [sender title];
00628     
00629     if ([sender tag] != CPSearchFieldRecentsMenuItemTag)
00630         [self _addStringToRecentSearches:searchString];
00631     
00632     [self setObjectValue:searchString];
00633     [self _sendPartialString];
00634 
00635     [self _updateCancelButtonVisibility];
00636 }
00637 
00638 - (void)_searchFieldClearRecents:(id)sender
00639 {
00640     [self setRecentSearches:[CPArray array]];
00641     [self _updateSearchMenu];
00642  }
00643 
00644 - (void)_registerForAutosaveNotification
00645 {
00646     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:self selector:@selector(_updateAutosavedRecents:) name:@"CPAutosavedRecentsChangedNotification" object:nil];
00647 }
00648 
00649 - (void)_deregisterForAutosaveNotification
00650 {
00651     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] removeObserver:self name:@"CPAutosavedRecentsChangedNotification" object:nil];
00652 }
00653 
00654 - (void)_autosaveRecentSearchList
00655 {  
00656     if (_recentsAutosaveName != nil) 
00657         [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] postNotificationName:@"CPAutosavedRecentsChangedNotification" object:_recentsAutosaveName];
00658 }
00659 
00660 - (void)_updateAutosavedRecents:(id)notification
00661 {
00662     var list = [self recentSearches],
00663         name = [notification object],
00664         bundle_name = [[[CPBundle mainBundle] infoDictionary] objectForKey:"CPBundleName"],
00665         cookie_name = [bundle_name lowercaseString] + "." + [notification object],
00666 
00667         cookie = [[CPCookie alloc] initWithName:cookie_name],
00668         cookie_value = [list componentsJoinedByString:@","];
00669     
00670     [cookie setValue:cookie_value 
00671              expires:[[CPDate alloc] initWithTimeIntervalSinceNow:3600*24*365] 
00672               domain:(window.location.href.hostname)];
00673 }
00674 
00675 - (void)_loadRecentSearchList
00676 {
00677     var list,
00678         name = [self recentsAutosaveName];
00679     
00680     if (name === nil)
00681         return;
00682 
00683     var bundle_name = [[[CPBundle mainBundle] infoDictionary] objectForKey:"CPBundleName"],
00684         cookie_name = [bundle_name lowercaseString] + "." + name,     
00685 
00686         cookie = [[CPCookie alloc] initWithName:cookie_name];
00687 
00688     if (cookie != nil)
00689     {
00690         var cookie_value = [cookie value];
00691         list = (cookie_value != @"") ? [cookie_value componentsSeparatedByString:@","] : [CPArray array];
00692         _recentSearches = list;
00693     }
00694 }

00698 var CPSearchButtonKey                   = @"CPSearchButtonKey",
00699     CPCancelButtonKey                   = @"CPCancelButtonKey",
00700     CPRecentsAutosaveNameKey            = @"CPRecentsAutosaveNameKey",
00701     CPSendsWholeSearchStringKey         = @"CPSendsWholeSearchStringKey",
00702     CPSendsSearchStringImmediatelyKey   = @"CPSendsSearchStringImmediatelyKey",
00703     CPMaximumRecentsKey                 = @"CPMaximumRecentsKey",
00704     CPSearchMenuTemplateKey             = @"CPSearchMenuTemplateKey";   
00705 
00706 @implementation CPSearchField (CPCoding)
00707 
00708 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)coder
00709 {
00710     [super encodeWithCoder:coder];
00711     
00712     [coder encodeObject:_searchButton forKey:CPSearchButtonKey];
00713     [coder encodeObject:_cancelButton forKey:CPCancelButtonKey];
00714     [coder encodeBool:_sendsWholeSearchString forKey:CPSendsWholeSearchStringKey];
00715     [coder encodeBool:_sendsSearchStringImmediately forKey:CPSendsSearchStringImmediatelyKey];
00716     [coder encodeInt:_maximumRecents forKey:CPMaximumRecentsKey];
00717     if (_recentsAutosaveName)
00718         [coder encodeObject:_recentsAutosaveName forKey:CPRecentsAutosaveNameKey];
00719     if (_searchMenuTemplate)
00720         [coder encodeObject:_searchMenuTemplate forKey:CPSearchMenuTemplateKey];
00721 }
00722 
00723 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)coder
00724 {
00725     self = [super initWithCoder:coder];
00726     
00727     _searchButton             = [coder decodeObjectForKey:CPSearchButtonKey];
00728     _cancelButton             = [coder decodeObjectForKey:CPCancelButtonKey];
00729     _recentsAutosaveName      = [coder decodeObjectForKey:CPRecentsAutosaveNameKey];
00730     _sendsWholeSearchString   = [coder decodeBoolForKey:CPSendsWholeSearchStringKey];
00731     _sendsSearchStringImmediately = [coder decodeBoolForKey:CPSendsSearchStringImmediatelyKey];
00732     _maximumRecents           = [coder decodeIntForKey:CPMaximumRecentsKey];
00733     var template              = [coder decodeObjectForKey:CPSearchMenuTemplateKey];
00734     if (template)
00735         [self setSearchMenuTemplate:template];
00736         
00737     [self setDelegate:self];
00738 
00739     return self;
00740 }
